file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 23-71-05-04 - CVR CONTROL UNIT - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL CVR CONTROL UNIT - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the cockpit voice recorder control unit (microphone monitor panel). B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY COCKPIT VOICE RECORDER CONTROL ALL 23-71-05-000-801-A UNIT - REMOVAL COCKPIT VOICE RECORDER CONTROL ALL 23-71-05-400-801-A UNIT - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 23-71-05 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-71-05-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. COCKPIT VOICE RECORDER CONTROL UNIT - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the microphone monitor panel of the CVR. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 225 Cockpit C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the CVR circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to it (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/COMM/CVR). I. Removal (Figure 401) (Figure 402) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Loosen the four dzus fasteners (3) which attach the CVR microphone monitor panel (2) to the overhead panel. (2) Carefully pull the CVR monitor panel (2) from the overhead panel to get access to the electrical connector (1). (3) Disconnect the electrical connector (1) from the CVR microphone monitor panel. (4) Install the blanking caps on the electrical connector (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-71-05 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH HONEYWELL CVR INSTALLED CVR Microphone Monitor Panel - Removal/Installation Figure 401 B A ZONE 225 DET. A 1. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR 3. DZUS FASTENERS 2. CVR MICROPHONE MONITOR PANEL (CVR CONTROL UNIT) DET. B 145AMM230089.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-71-05 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH L3 CVR INSTALLED CVR Microphone Monitor Panel - Removal/Installation Figure 402 B A ZONE 225 DET. A 1. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR 3. DZUS FASTENERS 2. CVR MICROPHONE MONITOR PANEL (CVR CONTROL UNIT) DET. B EM145AMM231021A.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-71-05 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-71-05-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. COCKPIT VOICE RECORDER CONTROL UNIT - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the microphone monitor panel of the CVR. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 23-71-00-700-802-A/500 VOICE RECORDING SYSTEM - OPERATIONAL TEST C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 225 Cockpit D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit I. Installation (Figure 401) (Figure 402) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Remove the blanking caps from the electrical connectors. (2) Support the CVR microphone monitor panel (2) and connect the electrical connector (1). (3) Carefully install the CVR microphone monitor panel (2) in the overhead panel. (4) Tighten the four dzus fasteners (3). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, close the CVR circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT- CLOSE tag from it (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/COMM/CVR). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 23-71-05 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Do the voice recording system operational test (AMM TASK 23-71-00-700-802-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 23-71-05 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
